title: Well Vayne buff seems to be going through.....big yikes
body:
Why did the balance team think this was a good idea? Perma stealth of all things.....
I'm glad that a lot of other games don't have a <Removed by Moderation> developer team who refuses to listen to players (and if they do only selectively).
Well, guess Kat's useless against ANOTHER ADC, bye bye sweet princess.

Peace.

replies.body: I would also ignore people like you who say "perma stealth" if I was a developer since you don't even know how AA modifiers work

If I was a developer I'd be ignoring people who clearly don't see how broken a change that promotes Vayne being this press R to win bot who just beats everyone the moment she presses R so long as she knows how to A click. 

If you want to buff Vayne.....don't. Vayne will be meta when tanks and the like are meta again. Plus, this is a damage buff as well except when she goes over 2.13ish attack speed.
It's not permastealth. The CD on Tumble only begins when Vayne autos, like other champs' AA modifiers.
You have under a second to react to that post 2 items. It's kinda fair level 6-10, but past that it's ridiculous.
